GSP29udnyku1u:9: śuddhabuddhasvabhāva ityaupaniṣadāḥ, ādividvān siddha iti kāpilāḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:12: lokavedaviruddhairapi nirlepaḥ svatantraśceti mahāpāśupatāḥ, śiva iti śaivāḥ, puruṣottama iti vaiṣṇavāḥ, pitāmaha iti paurāṇikāḥ, yajñapuruṣa iti yājñikāḥ, (4)sarvatra iti saugatāḥ, nivāraṇa iti digambarāḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:13: upāsyatvena deśita (nodita) iti mīmāṃsakāḥ, lokavyavahārasiddha iti cārvākāḥ,(5) yāvaduktopapanna iti naiyāyikāḥ, kiṃ bahunā- kāravo 'pi yaṃ viśvakarmeti upāsate, tasminneva jātigotrapravaracaraṇakuladharmādivadāsaṃsāraṃ prasiddhānubhā(bha)ve
GSP29udnyku1u:14: bhagavati bhave sandeha eva kutaḥ? kiṃ nirūpaṇīyam?- [ku.1.103] tathāpi-
GSP29udnyku1u:17: śruto hi bhagavān bahuśaḥ śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇeṣvidānīṃ mantavyo
GSP29udnyku1u:22: [ku.1.104] tadiha saṅkṣepataḥ pañcatayī vipratipattiḥ- alaukikasya paralokasādhanasyābhāvāt ; anyathāpi paralokasādhanānuṣṭhānasambhavāt ;
GSP29udnyku1u:29: tadā hi- syādeva, na syādeva vā- na tu kadācit syāt //
GSP29udnyku1u:30: akasmādeva bhavatīti cenna- hetubhūtiniṣedho na svānupākhyavidhirna ca /
GSP29udnyku1u:35: utpatteḥ pūrvaṃ svayamasataḥ svotpattāvaprabhutvena svasmāditi pakṣānupapatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:38: anupākhyasya hetutve prāgiti satvaprasaktau punaḥ sadātanatvāpatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:39: [ku.1.108] syādetat- na akasmāditi kāraṇaniṣedhamātraṃ vā bhavanapratiṣedho vā svātmahetukatvaṃ vā nirupākhyahetukatvaṃ
GSP29udnyku1u:43: na hyuttarakālasiddhitvamātraṃ kādācitkatm; kiṃ tu prāgasatve sati /
GSP29udnyku1u:44: sāvadhītve tu sa eva prācyo heturityucyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:45: [ku.1.109] astu prāgabhāva evāvadhiriti cenna, anyeṣāmapi tatkāle satvāt
GSP29udnyku1u:48: itaranirapekṣasya prāgabhāvasyāvadhitve prāgapi tadavadheḥ(13) kāryasya sattvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:49: [ku.1.110] santu ye kecidavadhayaḥ, na tu te 'pekṣyanta iti svabhāvārtha iti cet-”nāpekṣyanta” iti kor'thaḥ? kiṃ na niyatāḥ, āhosvinniyatā
GSP29udnyku1u:52: dvitīye tu kimupakārāntareṇa, niyamasyaivāpekṣārthatvāt, tasyaiva ca kāraṇātmatvāt, īdṛśasya ca svabhāvavādasyeṣṭatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:54: na hyākāśasya tattvamākasmikamiti sarvasya kiṃ na syāditi vaktumucitam”
GSP29udnyku1u:57: nanvevamihāpi sarvadā bhavataḥ kādācitkatvasvabhāvavyāghāta iti tulyaḥ
GSP29udnyku1u:58: parihāraḥ- na tulyaḥ- niravadhitve aniyatāvadhitve vā
GSP29udnyku1u:67: [ku.1.114] prāgabhāvo hyuttarakālāvadhiranādiḥ, evaṃ bhāvo 'pi ghaṭādiḥ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:69: tāvanmātrāvadhisvabhāvatve tadaharvat pūrvedyurapi tamavadhīkṛtya taduttarasya satvaprasaṅgāt; apekṣaṇīyāntarābhavāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:72: tadaharevānena bhavitavyamiti asya svabhāva iti cenna-tasyāpyahnaḥ
GSP29udnyku1u:76: [ku.1.115] tathāpi vyaktyapekṣayā niyamo 'stu, na jātyapekṣayeti cenna,
GSP29udnyku1u:78: (15) yadi hi yataḥ kutaścidbhavanneva tajjātīyasvabhāvaḥsyāt, sarvasya sarvajātīyatvamekajātīyatvaṃ vā syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:79: evaṃ (yadi) tajjātīyena yataḥ kutaścidbhavitavyamiti asya svabhāvaḥ,
GSP29udnyku1u:82: (16) ekaśaktimatvāditi cenna; yadi hi vijātīyeṣvapyekajātīya(17)kāryakaraṇaśaktiḥ samaveyāt, na kāryātkāraṇaviśeṣaḥ kvāpyanumīyeta; kāraṇavyāvṛtyā ca na tajjātīyasyaiva kāryasya vyāvṛttiravasīyeta tadabhāve 'pi tajjātīyaśaktimato 'nyasmādapi tadutpattisambhavāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:83: yāvaddarśanaṃ vyavasthā bhaviṣyatīti cenna, nimittasyādarśanāt, dṛṣṭasya cānimittatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:84: etena (18) sūkṣmajātīyā(sūkṣmādekajātīyatvā)diti nirastam, avahnerapi tatsaukṣmyāt dhūmotpattyāpatteḥ
GSP29udnyku1u:85: [ku.1.117] kāryajātibhedābhedayoḥ samavāyibhedābhedāveva tantram, na nimittāsamavāyinī iti cenna; tayorakāraṇatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:86: na hi sati bhāvamātraṃ tat; kiṃ tu satyeva bhāvaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:87: na ca jātiniyame samavāyikāraṇamātraṃ nibandhanam, api tu sāmagrī /
GSP29udnyku1u:93: [ku.1.119] (22)na; phūtkāreṇa tṛṇādereva, nirmanthanenāraṇereva pratiphalitataraṇikiraṇairmaṇereveti prakāraniyamavat tenaiva vyajyamānasya kāryajātibhedasya bhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:95: na tathā jvālājālajaṭilo 'pi dārudahanaḥ , na tarāñcakārīṣaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:96: yastu taṃ nākalayet, sa kāryasāmānyena kāraṇamātramanuminuyāditi
GSP29udnyku1u:98: [ku.1.120] evaṃ tarhi dhūmādāvapi kaścidanupalakṣaṇīyo viśeṣaḥ syāt, yasya
GSP29udnyku1u:102: pratyakṣānupalambhagocaro jātibhedo na kāryaprayojaka iti vadato bauddhasya śirasyeṣa prahāraḥ
GSP29udnyku1u:105: [ku.1.121] kiṃ punastārṇādau dahanasāmānyasya prayojakam; tṛṇādīnāṃ viśeṣa eva niyatatvāditi cet-(25) na /
GSP29udnyku1u:109: iyameva tejogatamudbhūtasparśamapekṣya dahanaṃ, tatrāpi jalaṃ prāpya
GSP29udnyku1u:110: divyaṃ, pārthivaṃ prāpya bhaumam, ubhayaṃ prāpyodaryamārabhata iti
GSP29udnyku1u:114: yathā- pradīpa eka eva timirāpahārī vartivikārakārī rūpāntaravyavahārakārīti cenna- vaicitryāt kāryasya /
GSP29udnyku1u:115: ekasya na kramaḥ kvāpi vaicitryaṃ ca samasya na /
GSP29udnyku1u:119: cet- (26)ayamapi ca kṣaṇabhaṅge parihāro na tu sahakārivāde /
GSP29udnyku1u:124: nāsāvadahano dahano vā syāt; ubhayātmako vā syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:128: na hi svādhīnamasyādahanatvam; api tu tajjanakasvabhāvādhīnam /
GSP29udnyku1u:129: tathā ca tadāyattatvāddahanasyāpi tattvaṃ kena vāraṇīyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:130: na hi tasmin janayitavye nāsau tatsvabhāvaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:141: na hi niṣphale duḥkhaikaphale vā kaścideko 'pi prekṣāpūrvakārī ghaṭeta;
GSP29udnyku1u:143: [ku.1.126] lābhapūjākhyātyarthamiti cet- lābhādaya eva kinnibandhanāḥ? na hīyaṃ pravṛttiḥ svarūpata eva taddhetuḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:144: yato vānena labdhavyaṃ yovainaṃ pūjayiṣyati, sa kimartham?
GSP29udnyku1u:149: traividyatapasvino dhūrtavakāḥ eveti cenna- teṣāṃ dṛṣṭasampadaṃ pratyanupayogāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:150: [ku.1.127] sukhārthaṃ tathā karotīti cenna- nāstikairapi tathā karaṇaprasaṅgāt, sambhogavat
GSP29udnyku1u:156: te 'pi vṛddhatarairityevamanādiriti cet- na tarhi vipralipsuḥ kaścidatra,
GSP29udnyku1u:158: idaṃ prathama eva kaścidanuṣṭhāyāpi dhūrtaḥ parān anuṣṭhāpayatīti cet-
GSP29udnyku1u:159: kimasau sarvalokottara eva; yaḥ sarvasvadakṣiṇayā sarvabandhuparityāgena
GSP29udnyku1u:160: sarvasukhavimukho brahmacaryeṇa tapasā śraddhayā vā kevalaparavañcana(29)kutūhalī yāvajjīvamātmānamavasādayati
GSP29udnyku1u:161: kathaṃ cainamekaṃ prekṣā (30)pūrvakāriṇo 'pyanuvidadhyuḥ? kena vā cinhenāyamīdṛśastvayā lokottaraprajñena pratāraka iti nirṇītaḥ? na hyetāvato duḥkharāśeḥ pratāraṇasukhaṃ garīyaḥ (31)yataḥ pākhaṇḍābhimateṣvapyevaṃ dṛśyata iti cenna-
GSP29udnyku1u:163: anādau caivambhūte 'nuṣṭhāne pratāyamāne prakārāntaramāśrityāpi bahuvittavyayāyāsopadeśamātreṇa pratāraṇā syāt; (32)natvanuṣṭhānāgocareṇa
GSP29udnyku1u:173: tadidamamīṣāmatīndriyaṃ rūpaṃ sahakāribhedo vā? na tāvat aindriyakasyātīndriyaṃ rūpam, vyāghātāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:178: tathā hi- karatalānalasaṃyogāt yādṛśādevadāho dṛṣṭaḥ, tādṛśādeva mantrādipratibandhe sati dāho na jāyate; asati tu jāyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:182: na ca pratibandhakābhāvaviśiṣṭā sāmagrī kāraṇam; abhāvasyākāraṇatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:194: na hi vidhirūpeṇāsau tuccha iti svarūpeṇāpi tathā; niṣedharūpābhāve
GSP29udnyku1u:196: kāraṇatvasya bhāvatvena vyāptatvāttannivṛttau tadapi nivartata iti
GSP29udnyku1u:200: abhāvasyāvarjanīyatayāsannidhiḥ na tu hetutveneti cet- tulyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:202: bhāvasyābhāvotsāraṇaṃ svarūpameveti cet- abhāvasyāpi bhāvotsāraṇaṃ svarūpānnātiricyate
GSP29udnyku1u:203: tasmāt yathā “bhāvasyaiva bhāvo janaka” iti niyamo 'nupapannaḥ, tathā
GSP29udnyku1u:206: [ku.1.132] pratibandhakottambhakaprayogakāle tu vyabhicārastadā syāt; yadi yādṛśe sati kāryānudayaḥ, tādṛśa eva sati utpādaḥ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:211: tathāpi viśeṣye satyeva viśeṣaṇamātrābhāvastatra; sa cottambhakamantra evetyanyaiva sāmagrīti cet- na, viśiṣṭasyāpyabhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:212: na hi daṇḍini sati adaṇḍānāmanyeṣāṃ nābhāvaḥ, kintu daṇḍābhāvasyaiva kevalasyeti yuktam
GSP29udnyku1u:213: yathā hi kevaladaṇḍasadbhāve, ubhayasadbhāve, dvayābhāve vā kevalapuruṣābhāvaḥ sarvatrāviśiṣṭaḥ, tathā kevalottambhakasadbhāve,
GSP29udnyku1u:218: bhāve vā kāmamasāvastu; kā no hāniḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:219: [ku.1.133] prākpradhvaṃsavikalpo 'pi nāniyatahetukatvāpādakaḥ, yasmin sati kāryaṃ na jāyate, tasminnasatyeva jāyata iti, atra saṃsargābhāvasyaiva prayojakatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:221: tathāpyabhāveṣu jāterabhāvāt kathaṃ trayāṇāmupagrahaḥ syāt; anupagṛhītānāṃ ca kathaṃ kāraṇatvāvadhāraṇamiti cet- mā bhūjjātiḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:225: kāryotpādaprasaṅgaḥ, anutpāde vā tato 'pyadhikaṃ kiñcidapekṣaṇīyamastīti nirastam /
GSP29udnyku1u:226: yathā hi “tajjātīye sati kāryaṃ jāyate, arthāt asati na jāyate” iti sthite tadbhāve 'pi tajjātīyāntarābhāvānna bhavitavyaṃ kāryeṇeti (36)na
GSP29udnyku1u:232: tataḥ kiṃ tasyākiñcitkaratvena? tatprayoktārastu pratibandhāraḥ, te ca kiñcitkarā eveti kimasamañjasam /
GSP29udnyku1u:233: ye tu vyutpādayanti; “kāryānutpāda eva pratibandha” iti- taiḥ
GSP29udnyku1u:235: tathā hi- kāryasyānutpādaḥ prāgabhāvo vā syāt, tasya kālāntaraprāptirvā /
GSP29udnyku1u:239: prāgabhāvāvacchedakakālopādhistadapekṣa iti cenna- mantrātpūrvamapi tasya bhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:242: [ku.1.136] na cedevaṃ śaktisvīkāre 'pi kaḥ pratīkāraḥ ? tathā hi pratibandhakena śaktirvā vināśyate, taddharmo vā, dharmāntaro vā janyate,
GSP29udnyku1u:247: tadvināśe taddharmavināśe vā punaruttambhakena tajjanane 'niyatahetukatvam; pūrvaṃ svarūpotpādakāt idānīmuttambhakādutpatteḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:248: na ca samānaśaktikatayā tulyajātīyatvānnaivamiti sāmpratam; vijātīyeṣu samānaśaktiniṣedhāt
GSP29udnyku1u:249: na ca pratibandhakaśaktimevottambhako viruṇaddhi, na tu bhāvaśaktimutpādayatīti sāmpratam; tadanutpādaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:254: na ca mantrādīneva sahakāriṇaḥ prāpya te kāryakāriṇa iti sāmpratam- teṣu ciradhvasteṣvapi kāryotpādāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:255: nāpi pradhvaṃsasahāyāste tathā; evaṃ hi yāgādipradhvaṃsā eva
GSP29udnyku1u:257: teṣāmanantatvādanantaphalapravāhaḥ prasajyata iti cet- apūrvepi kalpite tāvāneva phalapravāha iti kutaḥ ? apūrvasvābhāvyāditi cet- tulyamihāpi /
GSP29udnyku1u:261: yathā guruṇā ṭīkā; kuruṇā kṣetram- iti cet- tadasat /
GSP29udnyku1u:264: vyavahāramātraṃ tu tajjñānasādhyam, na tu tatsādhyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:267: (astu tāvat) astu vā tatrāpyatiśayakalpanā; kinnaśchinnam ? yadvā yāgāderapyupalakṣaṇatvamastu
GSP29udnyku1u:268: tadupalakṣitaḥ kālo yajvā vā svargādi sādhayiṣyati kṛtamapūrveṇa /
GSP29udnyku1u:269: [ku.1.139] na ca devadattasya svaguṇākṛṣṭāḥ śarīrādayo bhogāya,
GSP29udnyku1u:272: na ca tadrahitānāmapi bhoga iti yuktimat, yena tato 'pyadhikaṃ siddhyet /
GSP29udnyku1u:274: nāpi kāryatve satīti viśeṣaṇāyo hetuḥ; tathāpyupalakṣaṇaireva siddhasādhanāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:275: asatāṃ teṣāṃ kathamutpādakatvamiti cet- tadetadabhimantraṇādiṣvapi tulyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:276: [ku.1.140] tasmādbhāvabhūtamatiśayaṃ janayanta eva prokṣaṇādayaḥ kālāntarabhāvine phalāya kalpante /
GSP29udnyku1u:278: anyathā kṛṣyādayo durghaṭāḥ prasajyeran; bījādīnāmāparamāṇvantabhaṅgāt teṣu cāvāntarajāterabhāvānniyatajātīyakāryārambhānupapatteḥ
GSP29udnyku1u:281: yathā hi devatāviśeṣoddeśena hutāśane havirāhutayaḥ samantrāḥ prayuktāḥ
GSP29udnyku1u:282: puruṣamabhisaṃskurvate, na vanhiṃ, nāpi devatāḥ; tathā vrīhyādyuddeśena prayujyamānaḥ prokṣaṇādiḥ puruṣameva saṃskurute, na tam /
GSP29udnyku1u:283: tathā ca kārīrījanitasaṃskārādhārapuruṣasaṃyogājjalamucāṃ sañcaraṇajalakṣaraṇarūpā kriyā, tathā vrīhyādīnāṃ tattaduttarakriyāviśeṣāḥ
GSP29udnyku1u:286: [ku.1.142] na tarhi barhiṣa iva vrīhyādeḥ punarupayogāntaraṃ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:292: yathācābhicārasaṃskāro yaṃ dehamuddiśya prayuktastadapekṣa eva tatsambaddhasyaiva duḥkhamupajanayati nānyasya; na vā tadanapekṣaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:293: evamabhimantraṇādisaṃskārā api bhavanto na manāgapi nopayujyante /
GSP29udnyku1u:296: [ku.1.143] nanu yaduddeśena yatkriyate tattatra kiñcitkaram, yathā putreṣṭipitṛyajñau /
GSP29udnyku1u:297: tathā cābhimantraṇādayo vrīhyādyuddeśena pravṛttāḥ ityanumānamiti cet-
GSP29udnyku1u:299: na hi te kālāntarabhāviphalānuguṇaṃ kiñcit hutāśanādau janayanti /
GSP29udnyku1u:300: kiṃ vā na dṛṣṭamindriyaliṅgaśabdavyāpārāḥ prameyoddaśena pravṛttāḥ pramātaryeva kiñcijjanayanti, na prameye iti /
GSP29udnyku1u:301: [ku.1.144] kṛṣicikitse apyevameva syātāmiti cenna- dṛṣṭenaiva pākajarūpādi (38)pariṇatibhedenopapattāvadṛṣṭakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:306: yathā hi kalamabījaṃ yavādeḥ, narabījaṃ vānarādeḥ, gokṣīraṃ mahiṣādeḥ jātyā vyāvartate; tathā tatparamāṇavo 'pi mūlabhūtāḥ pākajaireva vyāvartante /
GSP29udnyku1u:307: na hyasti sambhavo gokṣīraṃ surabhimadhuraṃ śītam; tatparamāṇavaśca viparītāḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:312: tadānīṃ tu vibhaktānāmadṛṣṭādeva (44)kevalānmithaḥ saṃsarga iti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:313: na ca vācyamidānīmapi tathaiva kiṃ na syāt; yataḥ kṛṣyādikarmocchede tatsādhyānāṃ bhogānāmucchedaprasaṅgādavyavasthābhayāccādṛṣṭāni (45)(karmāṇi) dṛṣṭakarmavyavasthayaiva bhogasādhanānītyunnīyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:315: te ca tejo 'nilatoyasaṃsargaviśeṣaiḥ; te ca kriyayā; sā ca nodanābhighātagurutvavegadravatvādṛṣṭavadātmasaṃyogebhyo yathāyathamiti na
GSP29udnyku1u:318: tadyathā- hārītamāṃsaṃ haridrājalāvasiktaṃ (46)haridrāgnipluṣṭam upayogāt sadyo vyāpādayati
GSP29udnyku1u:321: [ku.1.147] yatra tarhi toye tejasi vāyau vā na pākajo viśeṣaḥ, tatra kathamudbhavānudbhavadravatvakaṭhinatvādayo viśeṣāḥ? kathaṃ vā (ca)
GSP29udnyku1u:322: pārthive pratimādau pratiṣṭhādinā saṃskṛte 'pi viśeṣābhāvāt pūjanādinā dharmo vyatikrame tvadharmaḥ apratiṣṭhite tu na kiñcit /
GSP29udnyku1u:323: na ca tatra yajamānadharmeṇānyasya sāhāyakamācaraṇīyam; anyadharmasyānyaṃ pratyanupayogāt upayoge vā sādhāraṇyaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:328: tathā svabhāvadravā apyāpo nimittabhedapratibaddhadravatvāḥ kaṭhinaṃ karakādyārabhante ityādi svayamūhanīyam /
GSP29udnyku1u:329: pratimādayastu tena tena vidhinā sannidhāpitarudropendramahendrādyabhimānidevatābhedāstatra tatrārādhanīyatāmāsādayanti; daṣṭamūrcchitaṃ rājaśarīramiva viṣāpanayanavidhinā'pāditacaitanyam sannidhānaṃ ca tatra teṣāmahaṅkāramamakārau, citrādāviva svasādṛśyadarśino rājña iti no darśanam /
GSP29udnyku1u:330: anyeṣāṃ tu pūrvapūrvapūjitapratyabhijñānaviṣayasya pratiṣṭhitapratyabhijñānaviṣayasya ca tathātvamavaseyam
GSP29udnyku1u:332: [ku.1.149] ghaṭādiṣu kā vārtā ? kuśalaiveti cenna- na hi sāmagrīdṛṣṭaṃ
GSP29udnyku1u:334: nāpyadṛṣṭamutpādayati; dharmajanane sarvadā vijayaprasaṅgāt; viparyaye sarvadā bhaṅgaprasaṅgāt- atrocyate-[ku.1.150] jayetaranimittasya vṛttilābhāya kevalam /
GSP29udnyku1u:336: yadyapi “dharmādyabhimānidevatāsannidhiratrāpi kriyate; tāśca karmavibhavānurūpaṃ liṅgamabhivyañjayantī'tyasmākaṃ siddhāntaḥ- tathāpi paravipratipatteranyathocyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:337: tenāpi hi vidhinā tadeva jayasya parājayasya vā nimittamabhivyaktaṃ (49)tadvibhāvakaṃ kāryamunmīlayati
GSP29udnyku1u:339: tacca sahakāri “so 'hamanena vidhinā tulāmadhirūḍhaḥ, yo 'haṃ pāpakārī niṣpāpo ve'ti pratyabhijñānam
GSP29udnyku1u:341: atha vā pratijñānurūpāṃ viśuddhimapekṣya tena dharmo janyate, nimittato vidhānādvijayaphalaśruteśca
GSP29udnyku1u:344: [ku.1.151] atha śaktiniṣedhe kiṃ pramāṇam? na kiñcit /
GSP29udnyku1u:346: na hi no darśane śaktipadārtha eva nāsti /
GSP29udnyku1u:354: tatrāpi- dahanāderanugrāhako 'dhiko 'styeva, yaḥ pratibandhakairapanīyata iti yadi, tadā na vivadāmahe /
GSP29udnyku1u:355: asmadabhipretasya cābhāvāderanugrāhakatvamaṅgīkṛtya niḥsādhanā mīmāsaṃkā api na vipratipattumarhanti
GSP29udnyku1u:356: tataḥ- abhāvādiranugrāhaka ityeke, netyapare, iti vivādakāṣṭhāyāṃ vyutpāditaṃ caitasyānugrāhakatvam
GSP29udnyku1u:358: [ku.1.152] tathāpi cetana evāyaṃ saṃskriyate, na bhūtānīti kuto nirṇaya iti cet- ucyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:360: na hi taccharīraṃ tanmanastānīndriyāṇi viśiṣṭānyapi tasyaiveti
GSP29udnyku1u:366: niyatacetanaguṇopagraheṇaiva tasyāpi niyamaḥ, na tu tajjanyatāmātreṇa;
GSP29udnyku1u:368: [ku.1.153] tathāpi tajjanyatayaiva niyamopapattau vipakṣe bādhakaṃ kimiti
GSP29udnyku1u:370: tadyathā- icchopagraheṇa prayatnaḥ, jñānopagraheṇecchādayaḥ, tadupagraheṇa sukhādaya ityādi
GSP29udnyku1u:371: prakṛte 'pi cetanagatā eva buddhyādayo niyāmakāḥ syuriti cenna; śarīrādeḥ prāk teṣāmasattvāt
GSP29udnyku1u:372: tathā ca niratiśayāścetanāḥ sādhāraṇāni bhūtānīti na bhuktiniyama upapadyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:387: bhedāgrāhācca niṣkriye 'pi tasmin puruṣe kartṛtvābhimānaḥ, tasminnacetane
GSP29udnyku1u:390: [ku.1.155] ālocanaṃ vyāpāra indriyāṇām; vikalpastu manasaḥ; abhimāno
GSP29udnyku1u:392: sā hi buddhiraṃśatrayavatī; puruṣoparāgo viṣayoparāgo vyāpārāveśaścetyaṃśāḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:394: tatra mayeti cetanoparāgo darpaṇasyeva mukhoparāgo bhedāgrahādatāttvikaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:395: idamiti viṣayoparāga indriyapraṇāḍikayā pariṇatibhedo darpaṇasyeva niśvāsābhihatasya malinimā pāramārthikaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:398: tena saha yaḥ puruṣoparāgasyātātvikasya sambandho darpaṇapratibimbitasya mukhasyeva malinimnā, sopalabdhiriti /
GSP29udnyku1u:401: na ca buddhireva svabhāvataścetaneti yuktam- pariṇāmitvāt; puruṣasya tu kūṭasthānityatvāditi
GSP29udnyku1u:403: tathā hi- kartṛdharmā niyantāraḥ cetitā ca sa eva naḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:409: tathā ca kṛtirapi (56)(svā)bhāvikī mahato na syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:414: yadyacca kārye rūpaṃ dṛśyate tasya tasya kāraṇātmakatve rāgādayo 'pi
GSP29udnyku1u:416: tathā ca saiva buddhiḥ, na prakṛtiḥ; bhāvāṣṭakasampannatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:417: sthūlatāmapahāya sūkṣma(rūpa)tayā te tatra santīti cet caitanyamapi tathā
GSP29udnyku1u:420: tathā sati ghaṭādīnāmapi caitanyaprasaṅgaḥ, tādātmyāditi cet-
GSP29udnyku1u:423: tasmāt yajjātīyāt kāraṇādyajjātīyaṃ kāryaṃ dṛśyate, tathā
GSP29udnyku1u:424: bhūtāttathābhūtamātramanumātavyam; na tu yāvaddharmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ tāvaddharmakaṃ kāryam, vyabhicārāditi kimanenāprastutena /
GSP29udnyku1u:427: atha vilīyate, tato nānādervilaya ityādimattve, tadanutpattidaśāyāṃ ko niyantā? prakṛteḥ sādhāraṇyāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:431: saukṣmyānna doṣa iti cet- muktāvapi punaḥpravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:434: saiva hi tattadvyāpāra(59)yogāttena tena śabdena vyapadiśyate
GSP29udnyku1u:443: ādhārādheyabhāvaḥ, viśeṣyatvam, sambandhamātraṃ vā bhede eva bhede 'pi
GSP29udnyku1u:449: karmajñānavāsane tu sarvatra pratibhūtaniyate anuvartiṣyete, yato bhogapratisandhānaniyama iti cet- ucyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:451: vāsanāsaṅkramo nāsti na ca gatyantaraṃ sthire //15 //
GSP29udnyku1u:452: n.a hi bhūtānāṃ samudāyaparyavasitaṃ caitanyam; pratidinaṃ tasyānyatve pūrvapūrvadivasānubhūtasyāsmaraṇaprasaṅgāt
GSP29udnyku1u:456: na copādānopādeyabhāvaniyamo gatiḥ; sthirapakṣe paramāṇūnāṃ tadabhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:460: na cātiśayo (60) vyatiricyate; kiṃ tu sādṛśyatiraskṛtatvāt drāgeva na vikalpyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:462: tathā ca bhūtānyeva tathā tathotpadyante, yathā yathā pratisandhānaniyamādayo 'pyupapadyante
GSP29udnyku1u:465: api ca-[ku.1.161] na vaijātyaṃ vinā tatsyānna tasminnanumā bhavet /
GSP29udnyku1u:466: vinā tena na tatsiddhirnādhyakṣaṃ niścayaṃ vinā //16 //
GSP29udnyku1u:467: n.a hi, “karaṇākaraṇayostajjātīyasya sataḥ sahakārilābhālābhau tantra'mityabhyupagame kṣaṇikatvasiddhiḥ; tathaikavyaktāvapyavirodhāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:468: tadvā tādṛgveti na kaścidviśeṣa iti nyāyāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:470: [ku.1.162] evaṃ ca, “kāraṇavat kārye 'pi kiñcidvaijātyaṃ syāt yasya
GSP29udnyku1u:471: kāraṇāpekṣā, na tu dṛṣṭajātīyasya” iti śaṅkayā na tadutpattisiddhiḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:472: dṛṣṭajātīyamākasmikaṃ syāditi cenna- tatrāpi kiñcidanyadeva prayojakaṃ
GSP29udnyku1u:474: “na kāryasya viśeṣastatprayuktatayopalabhyate; nāpi kāryasāmānyasyānyaprayojakaṃ dṛśyate” iti cet- tat kiṃ kāraṇasya viśeṣaḥ
GSP29udnyku1u:475: svagatastatprayojakatayopalabdhaḥ, kāraṇasāmānyasya vānyatprayojyāntaraṃ dṛśyate; yato vivakṣitasiddhiḥ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:479: na hi dhūmasya viśeṣaṃ dahanaprayojyaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ svabhāvānupalabdhiḥ prabhavati /
GSP29udnyku1u:481: kāryasya cātīndriyasyāpi sambhavāt; ata evānupalabdhyantaramapi niravakāśamiti /
GSP29udnyku1u:482: [ku.1.163] evaṃ vidhirūpayorvyāvṛttirūpayorvā jātyorvirodhe sati na samāveśaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:487: sāmagrīvirodhānnaivamiti cet- (61)kuta etat? parasparaparihāreṇa sarvadā vyavasthiteriti cet- nedamapyadhyakṣam /
GSP29udnyku1u:491: dṛśyate tāvadidamiti cet- gotvāśvatvayorapi na dṛkṣyata iti kā pratyāśā?
GSP29udnyku1u:497: evaṃ śākhādimanmātrānubandhī vṛkṣavyavahāraḥ; tadviśeṣānubandhī ca śiṃśapāvyavahāraḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:498: sa kathaṃ tamatipatyātmānamāsādayediti- cet- evaṃ tarhi śiṃśapāsāmagryantarbhūtā calanasāmagrī
GSP29udnyku1u:500: tathā śākhādimadviśeṣānubandhī śiṃśapāvyavahāraḥ, tadviśeṣānubandhī ca calanavyavahāraḥ
GSP29udnyku1u:502: [ku.1.165] nodanādyāgantukanibandhanaṃ calanatvam, na tu tadviśeṣamātrādhīnamiti cet- yadi nodanādayaḥ svabhāvabhūtāḥ;
GSP29udnyku1u:507: tathā ca kutaḥ kṣaṇikatvasiddhiḥ? [ku.1.166] svabhāvabhūtā evāgantukasahakāryanupraveśādbhavantīti cet- evaṃ tarhi vṛkṣasāmagryāmāgantukasahakāryanupraveśādeva śiṃśapāpi jāyata iti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:509: kintu śiṃśapājanakāstarusāmagrīmupādāyaiva calanajanakāstu na tāmeva; kiṃ tu mūrtamātram; tathā darśanāditi cenmaivam; kampajanakāḥ śiṃśapājanakaviśeṣā api santastānatipatanti; na tu vṛkṣajanakaviśeṣāḥ
GSP29udnyku1u:512: kampakāriṇastu na tathā; kintvāgantavaḥ[ntuka] sahakāriṇa iti cet- evaṃ tarhi tānāsādya sadṛśarūpā api kecit kampakāriṇaḥ, anāsāditasahakāriṇastu na tathā /
GSP29udnyku1u:513: tathā ca tadvā tādṛgveti na kaścidviśeṣa (64) iti syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:517: teṣāṃ tu viruddhānāṃ na samāveśo vyaktibhedāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:519: tathā ca kutaḥ kṣaṇikatm? vaijātyābhyupagame ca kuto 'numānavārtā /
GSP29udnyku1u:520: [ku.1.170] mā bhūdanumānamiti cenna- tena hi vinā (65)na tat siddhyet /
GSP29udnyku1u:521: na hi kṣaṇikatve pratyakṣamasti; tathā niścayābhāvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:526: tato vartamānatvaniścaya eva bhedaniścaya iti cet- kimatra tadabhi[pi]
GSP29udnyku1u:527: matamāyuṣmataḥ? yadi dharmyeva nīlādiḥ, na kiñcidanupapannam; tasya sthairyāsthairyasādhāraṇyāt
GSP29udnyku1u:528: atha dharmaḥ “tadbhedaniścaye 'pi dharmiṇaḥ kimāyātam? tasya tato 'nyatvāt
GSP29udnyku1u:529: vartamānāvartamānatvamekasya viruddhamiti cet- yadi sadasattvaṃ tat”
GSP29udnyku1u:533: krameṇānekasambhandha ekasyānupapanna iti cet- astitāvadato nirūpaṇīyam kṣaṇapratyayastu bhrānto 'pi nāstīti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:534: mā bhūdadhyakṣa(67)manumānaṃ vā kṣaṇikatve; tathāpi sandeho 'stu /
GSP29udnyku1u:535: etāvatāpi siddhaṃ samīhitaṃ cārvākasyeti cet- ucyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:537: ekatāniścayo yena kṣaṇe, tena sthire mataḥ //17 //
GSP29udnyku1u:538: n.a hi sthire taddarśane vā svarasavāhī sandehaḥ; pratyabhijñānasya durapahnavatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:539: nāpi tatprāmāṇye; sa hi na tāvatsārvatrikaḥ; vyāghātāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:540: tathā hi- prāmāṇyāsiddhau sandeho 'pi na siddhyet; tatsiddhau vā tadapi
GSP29udnyku1u:543: sandehārthaḥ? taddarśane ca kathaṃ sarvathā tadasiddhiḥ /
GSP29udnyku1u:544: etenāprāmāṇikastadvyavahāra iti nirastam; sarvathā prāmāṇyāsiddhau tasyāpyasiddheḥ? [ku.1.173] prakṛte prāmāṇyasandehaḥ, lūnapunarjātakeśādau vyabhicāradarśanāditi cet- na ekatvaniścayasya tvayāpīṣṭatvāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:546: siddhyatu, yatra viruddhadharmaviraha iti cet- tenaiva sthiratvamapi niścīyate /
GSP29udnyku1u:547: sa iha sandihyata iti cet- tulyametat /
GSP29udnyku1u:549: [ku.1.174] nanvetat kāraṇatvaṃ yadi svabhāvo bhāvasya, nīlādivat, tadā sarvasādhāraṇaṃ syāt
GSP29udnyku1u:553: athāsādhāraṇatvamapyasya svabhāva eva; tata utpatterārabhya kuryāt;
GSP29udnyku1u:554: sthirasyaikasvabhāvatvāditi cet- ucyate-[ku.1.175] hetuśaktimanādṛtya nīlādyapi na vastusat
GSP29udnyku1u:555: tadyuktaṃ tatra tat śaktamiti sādhāraṇaṃ na kim //18 //
GSP29udnyku1u:556: sarvasādhāraṇanīlādivaidharmyeṇ.a kālpanikatvaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasya vyutpādayatā nīlādi pāramārthikamevābhyupagantavyam, anyathā tadvaidharmyaiṇa hetuphalabhāvasyāpāramārthikatvānupapatteḥ na ca kāryakāraṇabhāvasyāpāramārthikatve nīlādi pāramārthikaṃ bhavitumarhati, nityatvaprasaṅgāt
GSP29udnyku1u:559: tatsvabhāvatvāditi yadi, tadotpatterārabhya kuryādaviśeṣāt” ityapi na yuktam; tattatsahakārisācivye tattatkāryaṃ karotīti svabhāvavyavasthāpanāt
GSP29udnyku1u:570: janito hi tena sa tasya syāt, nityo vā /
GSP29udnyku1u:573: tathāpi copādhireva vyatirekaḥ; na tasya; aviśeṣāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:575: aviśeṣāttadvata iti cet-) na; sa copādhiścetyato 'nyasya
GSP29udnyku1u:577: bhāve vā sa eva kāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:578: atrocyate-[ku.1.178] pūrvabhāvo hi hetutvaṃ mīyate yena kenacit /
GSP29udnyku1u:580: bhavedeva.m, yadyanvayavyatirekāveva kāraṇatvam; kiṃ tu kāryānniyataḥ
GSP29udnyku1u:583: anyathā kāryāt kāraṇānumānaṃ kvāpi na syāt; tena tasyānuvidhānānupalambhāt upalambhe vā kāryaliṅgānavakāśāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:587: siddhyet; anyatra tathā darśanāditi cenna- bādhena saṅkocāt; vipakṣe bādhakābhāvena cāvyāpteḥ
GSP29udnyku1u:590: sarvavyāpakānāṃ sarvān pratyanvayamātraviśeṣe kāraṇatvaprasaṅgo bādhakamiti cenna- anvayavyatirekavajjātīyatayā vipakṣe bādhakena ca viśeṣe 'natiprasaṅgāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:592: tajjātīyakāraṇakam- āśrayābhāve kiṃ pratyāsannam asamavāyikāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP29udnyku1u:594: tathā cānutpattiḥ satatotpattirvā sarvatrotpattirvā syāt evamapi nimittasya sāmarthyādeva niyatadeśotpāde sa eva deśo 'vaśyāpekṣaṇīyaḥ syāt
GSP29udnyku1u:595: tathā ca sāmānyato deśasiddhau itarapṛthivyādibādhe tadatiriktasiddhiṃ ko vārayet /
GSP29udnyku1u:597: [ku.1.180] ityeṣā sahakāriśaktirasamā māyā durunnītitaḥ mūlatvātprakṛtiḥ prabodhabhayato 'vidyeti yasyoditā /
GSP29udnyku1u:598: devo 'sau virataprapañcaracanākallolakolāhalaḥ sākṣātsākṣitayā manasyabhiratiṃ badhnātu śānto mama //20 //
